name: classic veggie burger
description: A delicious classic veggie burger made with a mix of fresh vegetables, herbs, and spices. Grilled to perfection and served with crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, and a tangy sauce. Perfect for vegetarians and anyone who loves a good, hearty burger.

name: spicy chicken burger
description: Our spicy chicken burger is packed with flavor! Featuring a succulent, spicy chicken patty, topped with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and a spicy mayo sauce. A great choice for those who like their burgers with a bit of a kick.

name: double cheese beef burger
description: This burger is a meat lover's dream! A juicy beef patty topped with double layers of melted cheese, crispy lettuce, onions, and our special burger sauce. Served on a toasted bun, it's a classic that never goes out of style.

name: bbq bacon burger
description: Our BBQ Bacon Burger combines the smoky flavor of barbecue sauce with crispy bacon and a juicy beef patty. Topped with cheddar cheese, lettuce, and onions, this burger is a mouthwatering experience you won't want to miss.
